Title: London River
Writer: Rachid Bouchareb (screenplay), Olivier Lorelle (screenplay), Zoé Galeron (screenplay)
Actors: Brenda Blethyn, Sotigui Kouyaté, Sami Bouajila, Roschdy Zem
Plot: After traveling to London to check on their missing children in the wake of the 2005 terror attack on the city, two strangers come to discover their respective children had been living together at the time of the attacks.
